items.name: Moistorizing Shampoo
items.description: Enriched with vitamin E and avocado oil for smooth sleek strands.

items.name: Moistorizing Conditioner
items.description: Enriched with vitamin E and avocado oil for smooth sleep strands.  Best used with Aussie Moistorizing Shampoo.

items.name: Extra Strength Heat Protecting Spray
items.description: A protective shield for your hair to defend against damaging heat from styling.

items.name: Dry Shampoo
items.description: For when wet shampoo is not an option.  I mean who has time to shower anyway?!

items.name: Extra Holde Curling Mousse
items.description: Extra hold without the crunch for curls that spring.

items.name: Leave-in Conditioner
items.description: Leave in conditioner to help hydrate dry locks.
